title: Addiction Recovery DIY: Do it Yourself - Conquer Your Drug or Alcohol Addiction at Home
description: The "Addiction Recovery DIY" workbook, for conquering recovery at home, supports those struggling with a drug or alcohol addiction as they work through the top Addiction Therapy and Coaching Methods utilized today.The "Addiction Recovery DIY" self-help resource also serves as the activity book for the “Addiction Recovery DIY” video series.
author: K.J. Gordon
